Northland thieves fleece visiting charity food growing group twice in 10 days https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-thieves-fleece-visiting-charity-food-forming-group-twice-in-10-days/6QR25GOLPREOVFVI5EQ35UGGWU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-thieves-fleece-visiting-charity-food-forming-group-twice-in-10-days/6QR25GOLPREOVFVI5EQ35UGGWU/ Sarah CurtisThieves have hampered the efforts of a charity food growing initiative visiting Northland Mon, 30 Dec 2024 23:30:00 +0000 Whenua Warrior charitable trust founder Kelly Francis is happy helping communities grow their own food. However, she's "devastated" that one of those communities in Northland recently stole all the trust's tools and vandalised two of its vehicles.

Mon, 30 Dec 2024 17:00:01 +0000 A patched member of the Mongrel Mob has been charged with drugs and firearms offences after police found 2kg of meth, an AK-47 rifle and a pistol at the Ahikaa Trust bail facility on the North Shore.
